divs: Sighting DetailsMy son's friend who goes to college in Arkansas, texted him and said he th ought he witnessed a UFO. My son then looked out his upstairs window that was facing east and saw a bright yellow moving light in the sky that was moving down over the horizon. He took a picture of it on his cell phone and came down and showed it to me. We got in my car and tried to see it again, but did not see it, there are large trees in our neighborhood. He said it was not a meteor or aircraft. Do you have anymore sightings of this?
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around April 15th 2012
Summary: my son received message from friend in Ark about ufo, my son then looked out our upstairs window and took a picture of the object on cell phone
